entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:37 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
